name: undigested
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of food or parts of food) not changed in your stomach into substances that your body can use: From the undigested food in her stomach, the coroner concluded that she must have died in the short time she was with him. Experts say ground flax is healthier than whole seed because whole seed passes through the body undigested.
More examplesFewer examplesBecause the body doesn't tolerate undigested fat well, it will try to get rid of it as quickly as possible. Fibre passes through our systems undigested and is classified as soluble and insoluble.As a result, the undigested lactose remains in the intestines, causing abdominal cramps, bloating and diarrhoea.
